author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
SO MUCH has happened in the Aranthian Succession plotline for Necromunda and this big book puts a wrap on these 'Game of Thrones' style events in the underhive. Let's check it out!

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the book to review. 

#AdWIP

#Necromunda

#WarhammerCommunity

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

title: GMG Reviews - NECROMUNDA: Spire of Primus by Games Workshop
